trigger.name: High ups input current 1
trigger.description: Trigger for UPS input current when value is bigger or equal 200.

trigger.name: Information ups input current 1
trigger.description: Trigger for UPS input current when value is bigger or equal 100.

trigger.name: High ups input current 2
trigger.description: Trigger for UPS input current when value is bigger or equal 200.

trigger.name: Information ups input current 2
trigger.description: Trigger for UPS input current when value is bigger or equal 100.

trigger.name: High ups input current 3
trigger.description: Trigger for UPS input current when value is bigger or equal 200.

trigger.name: Information ups input current 3
trigger.description: Trigger for UPS input current when value is bigger or equal 100.

trigger.name: High ups Input Frequency 1
trigger.description: Trigger for UPS input frequency when value is different 60.

trigger.name: High ups Input Frequency 2
trigger.description: Trigger for UPS input frequency when value is different 60.

trigger.name: High ups Input Frequency 3
trigger.description: Trigger for UPS input frequency when value is different 60.

trigger.name: High Ups Input voltage 1
trigger.description: Trigger for UPS input voltage when value is bigger than or equal 20% or less than or equal 20%

trigger.name: Warning Ups Input voltage 1
trigger.description: Trigger for UPS input voltage when value is bigger than or equal 5% or less than or equal 5%

trigger.name: High Ups Input voltage 2
trigger.description: Trigger for UPS input voltage when value is bigger than or equal 20% or less than or equal 20%

trigger.name: Warning Ups Input voltage 2
trigger.description: Trigger for UPS input voltage when value is bigger than or equal 5% or less than or equal 5%

trigger.name: High Ups Input voltage 3
trigger.description: Trigger for UPS input voltage when value is bigger than or equal 20% or less than or equal 20%

trigger.name: Warning Ups Input voltage 3
trigger.description: Trigger for UPS input voltage when value is bigger than or equal 5% or less than or equal 5%

trigger.name: High ups Output Frequency
trigger.description: Trigger for UPS output frequency when value is different that 60.

trigger.name: Output load 1 Information on {HOST.NAME}
trigger.description: Trigger for UPS output load when value is bigger or equal 60.

trigger.name: Output load 2 Information on {HOST.NAME}
trigger.description: Trigger for UPS output load when value is bigger or equal 60.

trigger.name: Output load 3 Information on {HOST.NAME}
trigger.description: Trigger for UPS output load when value is bigger or equal 60.

trigger.name: Information UPS output voltage 1
trigger.description: Trigger for UPS output voltage when value is bigger or equal 231 or less than or equal 209..

trigger.description: Trigger for UPS output voltage when value is bigger or equal 231 or less than or equal 209..

trigger.name: Information UPS output voltage 3
trigger.description: Trigger for UPS output voltage when value is bigger or equal 231 or less than or equal 209.

trigger.name: The battery power is too low to support the load on {HOST.NAME}
